source: It's been an entire year, and I'm still dreaming of him.{#Name="Zero"}
My eye hurts like a bitch.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Eu demorei muito pra me curar...{#Name="Zero"}
source: I can't believe how long it took my wounds to heal.{#Name="Zero"}
My new arm seems good to go.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Não é a melhor das soluções, mas qualquer{LF}coisa serve.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Not the most elegant of solutions, but hey,{LF}I've never been picky.{#Name="Zero"}
Open the door and head outside?{#Name=" "}
This is a story of six sisters{#Name="Accord"}

translation: num mundo protegido pelo poder da canção:{#Name="Accord"}
source: in a world protected by the power of song:{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Uma dessas irmãs quer trazer ruína ao mundo,{#Name="Accord"}
source: But one of these sisters seeks to bring about the world's ruin,{#Name="Accord"}

translation: e ela não descansará até matar suas irmãs.{#Name="Accord"}
source: and she won't rest until all the others are dead.{#Name="Accord"}
The traitorous Intoner is called Zero...{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Ela fugiu para a Terra dos Mares, onde se cura... e aguarda.{#Name="Accord"}
source: And she has fled to the Land of Seas, where she heals...and waits.{#Name="Accord"}
